name: A Harold Between Worlds
description:
My entry into the prestigious Harold Jam 2022: Dark Universe!

https://itch.io/jam/haroldjam22

A hybrid JRPG / Zelda-like with some puzzle elements and a somewhat branching(ish) story.

Fairly challenging, using the Brave Turn Battle system for some strategic combat. (difficulty slider included for folks that just want to see the story!)

Forewarning, it's a bit on the longer side: 1 hr+ first playthrough.
